attributes.action: Call upon David Cameron to stand down as UK Prime Minister
attributes.background: Due to recent events and incredible unpopularity since the general election in 2015, many people of the British public wish for David Cameron to stand down as PM. The government is meant to represent the interests of the public, and Mr. Cameron does not adequately do this.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the resignation of the Prime Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
